title: A Stolen Ring - Chapter 1
body:
E, 4.5k

Phil stumbles as he jostles into a shoulder, a sharp pang rippling through his right bicep. His heavy textbooks—he never would have guessed that textbooks were required for an art course, but here he is—fly out of his arms, pencils and paintbrushes clacking noisily onto the thin-carpeted floor. Phil cringes. He hopes the thud of his books wasn’t as loud as it had sounded.

“Fuck!” An oddly familiar voice hollers, drawing the attention of nearby students.

Well. So much for not being noticed.

read on ao3!

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

summary: Hi! I just wanted to say your blog always makes me smile (your tags are so great! And I relate to the phil thirst on a spiritual...
question: Hi! I just wanted to say your blog always makes me smile (your tags are so great! And I relate to the phil thirst on a spiritual level). Thanks for being you!
answer: :(( ty ly bb. You’re so lovely! This made my morning ❤️Thirsting after Phil is a way of life and I’m glad you’re on the team
